pages.text: These Concept Cores assembled with the $(l:io_tools/interoperation_wand)Interoperation Wand$() have special effects showing below.
This concept core imitates a vanilla bone meal farm. Use it as a vanilla bone meal!
This concept core imitates a vanilla bone meal farm based on a moss block. It cools down faster than the above one.
Storm Drain! This concept core imitates the function of a vanilla sponge block, and can be dried automatically.
This concept core imitates the bug of destroying an ender portal frame by a giant mushroom. Use it carefully.
This concept core imitates a duplicate tnt bomber, which can directly destroy everything that can be exploded within a chunk. Use it carefully.
This concept core imitates the vanilla TNT replication bug, and can spawn a primed TNT on your face.
This concept core imitates a vanilla villager spawn farm, and can spawn a villager on your face.
